Name: Poesy
Weapon Desc: A persuasive thresher
Item 1 Desc: No weather or terrain may impede you; A1
Passion Desc: whenever a beautiful outcome is chosen over a simple or pratical one
Craft Desc: Conjure a flame between yourself and a target. The flames will spread quickly if able, but will always leave open a single path for you to retreat safely. Anyone caught in the flames takes \statBlock{2d6} damage.
Omen Desc: You become absorbed in a story told, unbidden, by a woman you have never seen before. When it ends you find yourself alone in wilderness.

title: Crown Description
type: random
format: cXX
headers:
  - Flower
  - Implication
rows:
  - [Mandrake, Secrets]
  - [Iris, Guidance]
  - [Foxglove, Protection]
  - [Peony, Jealousy]

Name: Prolix
Weapon Desc: Adorned with a carving of an alert crow
Item 1 Desc: Those who drink from it can not harm you
Passion Desc: whenever an action is continued well beyond it's logical completion
Craft Desc: Render a target unable to stop speaking until you command it. During this period their clarity is reduced to 1.
Omen Desc: A red fox approaches and clearly beckons you to a hole in the side of a low hill. Inside is a roiling mass of rabbits, uncountable in number.

Name: Volta
Weapon Desc: Cleaver of uncountable stones
Passion Desc: whenever an action is taken which weakens an assumption or tradition
Craft Desc: Choose a mundane, non-violent, action to have a possible but improbable outcome
Omen Desc: In a vicious robbery, the slender man next to you is stabbed deep in the chest with a dagger. As the blade is pulled free, it is followed by a spray of glittering, golden blood.

Name: Mora
Weapon Desc: A small shield of taut leather around scarred iron spikes
Item 1 Desc: Your spirit becomes unbound from your body and takes flight
Passion Desc: whenever an action repeated across unrelated circumstances
Craft Desc: Non-attack actions repeated without interruption gain strength rapidly

Name: Calx
Weapon Desc: Heavy, but you are unburdened
Passion Desc: whenever an action is taken which brings clear end to something
Craft Desc: Trap an object placed on/in the ground from ever being retrieved

Name: Marl
Weapon Desc: Plain and worn, but clearly not a peasants tool
Item 1 Desc: Plants grow miraculously at your command; A1
Passion Desc: whenever a peaceful solution is chosen over violence

Name: Castigation
Weapon Desc: Cruel flanges in glimmering bronze
Item 1 Desc: Leaves an invisible mark which fosters strong reactions

Name: Crux
Weapon Desc: Intricately carved bone handle with insets with moonstone
Item 1 Desc: Your max GD can not be lower than 6, ignore scar rolls; A1

Name: Bridge
Weapon Desc: Its pale shaft bears a dark stain of old blood
Item 1 Desc: Your appearance becomes monsterous at will; A1
Omen Desc: Working through a crowded square, you are struck by a sudden stillness and silence. A woman locks eyes with you and with only a nod tells you something you do not want to know.

Name: Entrenchment
Weapon Desc: A wall of wood, bone, and mud
Item 1 Desc: Render any passageway inpenetrable or prevent any object from being moved

Name: Exaction
Weapon Desc: Twin edges gleam with a portent of violence
Item 1 Desc: Easily stretched, contents have no apparent volume or weight

Name: Supplication
Weapon Desc: Stout and tipped with scaled iron

Name: Umbra
Weapon Desc: Deadly and easily concealed
Item 1 Desc: Impress on a document to bestow authority
Item 2 Desc: Conform to any size and require no key
Craft Desc: Create a static shadow which will not be noticed as unnatural
Omen Desc: You come upon a meager home, but as you approach the earth shakes violently, collapsing the structure. A moan emanates from the ruins.

Name: Hinterlight
Weapon Desc: Bares the crest of a once proud knight
Item 1 Desc: See the last moments of the dead through its eyes

Name: Bedlam
Weapon Desc: It's crimson thread draws with light effort
Item 1 Desc: Belligerents are strangely drawn to it when exposed

Name: Saros
Weapon Desc: Double-bitted and adorned with crescents
Item 1 Desc: With clear sky your vision is not impaired at night

Name: Husk
Weapon Desc: Chipped and rusted blade cuts painfully
Item 1 Desc: Contains a trapped soul which may embody a mundane object on demand

Name: Viscera
Weapon Desc: Torn from the hands of a tarnished knight

Name: Tempest
Weapon Desc: Knights grimace at its presence

Name: Disspipation
Weapon Desc: Its power requires great skill
Item 1 Desc: Eases the worries of another when rubbed
